about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant and mystical world of Spire Horizon Online, an MMORPG set in the fantasy kingdom of Aetheria.

The Kingdom of Aetheria was once a prosperous and peaceful land, but it has been invaded by demons and monsters, turning it into a battleground between light and darkness. Players take on the role of resurrected skeleton warriors, brought back to life by ancient magic to restore balance and peace to the kingdom.

Explore a vast and meticulously crafted world filled with lush forests, towering castles, and enchanting landscapes. The kingdom features various regions, each offering unique challenges and adventures. Crimson Dunes is a harsh desert filled with ancient ruins and treacherous cliffs where players must navigate sandstorms and face formidable desert creatures. Frozen Peaks is a perilous snow-covered mountain range with icy caves and towering cliffs that hide dangerous but rewarding secrets. Ethereal Gardens is a breathtaking area with floating islands, lush greenery, and ancient ruins where magic flows freely and nature's beauty is at its peak.

Choose from 25 unique classes, each with its own distinct abilities and playstyle. Whether you prefer the brute strength of a Berserker, the stealthy precision of an Assassin, or the arcane prowess of a Sorcerer, there is a class to suit every adventurer's preference.

Engage in epic battles against over 150 different monsters, ranging from fierce beasts to powerful dark wizards. Unravel the mysteries of the kingdom through immersive quests, challenging dungeons, and dynamic events that will test your strategic skills and teamwork.

Spire Horizon Online offers an unparalleled character progression system, allowing players to customize their skills, weapons, and armor to create the ultimate warrior. Collaborate with friends to join large-scale PvP battles and defeat formidable world bosses.

With stunning stylized graphics, an immersive storyline, and endless opportunities for adventure, Spire Horizon Online invites you to embark on a journey of heroism and destiny. Will you rise to the challenge and restore the Kingdom of Aetheria to its former glory?

name: Spire Horizon Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600k | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Spire Horizon Online is an MMORPG where players become skeleton adventurers on a quest to find their capybara friend. Choose from a variety of classes, battle numerous monsters, and explore diverse regions.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
